description_for_human: Access public property data, including details, photos, and availability.
description_for_model: Plugin for accessing vacation rental property data. Use this to search for properties, get detailed information including amenities and photos, and check availability calendars.

endpoints.description: Get a list of all public properties with basic details (ID, name, price, capacity).
Get full details for a specific property, including hydrated inventory, amenities, and photos.
Get availability calendar for a property (list of occupied dates).
